content: I don't have personal preferences or opinions. however, i suggest that you consider visiting the bell tower and drum tower first as they are located in the city center, and you can even climb to the top for free to enjoy the views of the old city. and then, you can explore the muslim quarter, which is also located in the old city and has a lot of local snacks, souvenir shops, and a vibrant atmosphere. finally, you can visit the xi'an city wall or the small wild goose pagoda, depending on your interests and schedule.
